event.title: was declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1986

data.event: It was declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1986 for its extensive cultural and monumental heritage and historical co-existence of Christian, Muslim and Jewish cultures.
In 1085, the city fell to Alfonso VI of Castile as the first major city in the Christian Reconquista.
